Grid Auto Flow

# Grid Auto Flow

## Usage

Please refer to the documentation on the Tailwind CSS website

## Compatibility

| Class                       | Support     |
| --------------------------- | ----------- |
| ```
grid-flow-row
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
grid-flow-col
```       | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
grid-flow-dense
```     | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
grid-flow-row-dense
``` | 🌐 Web only |
| ```
grid-flow-col-dense
``` | 🌐 Web only |
